agileManuevers.name: Scale Monster
agileManuevers.target: 1 creature that is 2 sizes larger than you
agileManuevers.description:
You attempt to climb up on a to deal more damage effectively. Make an [AGI] or [STR] Athletics [SKILL TEST] against the target’s [DODGE]. On a success you are now mounted on top of the creature which has the following effects.:
One hand is always occupied with holding on to the creature
Any [MELEE MARTIAL ATTACK] that is not a critical miss automatically hits the target and the required roll for a critical is 1 lower.
ou can’t be targeted by the creature you are currently on, on it’s turn however it can attempt to shake you of by spending 1 [AP] and you have to succeed on a [HARDNESS] [SAVE] against the creature’s Melee Attack Bonus+10. On a fail you are thrown away a number of meters equal to the creatures [STR] and might recieve fall damage as a result.

agileManuevers.name: Reactive Move
agileManuevers.description: If a creature moves within 6m you can instantly move [AGI]/2 meters

maneuverPush.pushingDescription: For each stamina used, you can move an extra 1.5 m.

agileManuevers.name: Wall Run
agileManuevers.description: Make a Move, during that move you can move vertically along moves. If at the end of your [TURN] you are not standing or holding on to anything, you are falling down.

maneuverPush.pushingDescription: If you use this Ability again during your [TURN] it only costs 1 [MP].

brawlManeuvers.name: Bodyguard
brawlManeuvers.description: If an ally was hit by an [ATTACK] that is not a critical hit, you can use this [REACTION] and take the hit yourself instead. Even if your [DODGE] is hgher than the [ATTACK] you are still hit, however if your Shield Block is higher than it hits your shield instead.

maneuverPush.pushingDescription: You can also use this ability when the [ATTACK] was a critical hit.

brawlManeuvers.name: Giant Leap
brawlManeuvers.description: Make a Jump Move and increase the jumping distance by an additional [STR] m for a long jump or [STR]/2 m for a high jump.

maneuverPush.pushingDescription: Increase the distance by further [STR]/2 m for a long jump or [STR]/4 m for a high jump.

brawlManeuvers.description: Make a Jump Move and increase the jumping distance by an additional [STR] m for a long jump or [STR]/2 m for a high jump.

maneuverPush.pushingDescription: Increase the distance by further [STR]/2 m for a long jump or [STR]/4 m for a high jump.

leaderManeuvers.name: Rallying Cry
leaderManeuvers.description: You inspire yourself and allies near you and boost their resolve. You and the creatures you target recieve [THP] equal to your [MARTIAL LEVEL] + [CHA], you can't target creatures with this ability that can't hear you..

leaderManeuvers.name: Get Back in the Fight
leaderManeuvers.target: 1 [UNCONCIOUS] allied creature, or one that is at Deaths' door.
leaderManeuvers.description: You convince one of your allies that their fight is not over. That ally regains [HP] equal to your [MARTIAL LEVEL] +[CHA] and if they are [PRONE] can use their [REACTION] to stand up. You can't traget creatures that can't hear you.

fortitudeManeuvers.name: Overextend
fortitudeManeuvers.description: You push yourself and grant yourself an extra 2 [AP] this turn, however next turn you start with 2 [AP] less.

tacticalManeuvers.name: Cut of the Retreat
tacticalManeuvers.description: You form a plan to stop a creature from escaping, for the duration any Opportunity Attack of your alies against the target have [ADVANTAGE] and each time the target is hit by an [ATTACK] it loses 1 [MP] for it's next turn. Additionally any Disengage moves made by the target cost 1 additional [MP].

tacticalManeuvers.name: Analyze Weakpoint
tacticalManeuvers.description: You attempt to analyze a creature Weakpoint. Make a [INT] [MARTIAL TEST] where the [DT] is 15 + the creatures [LEVEL]. On a success the next [ATTACK] that you make against this creature during your turn automatically becomes a critical hit.

weaponManeuvers.name: Shield Throw
weaponManeuvers.description: You can treat your shield like a thrown weapon and make a [RANGED MARTIAL ATTACK] with it and afterwards it bounces back towards you regardless if the [RANGED MARTIAL ATTACK] hits or not. The shield has a range of 6m/12m/24m and deals 1d8 + [STR] physical damage to the target on a hit.

maneuverPush.pushingDescription: If your [RANGED MARTIAL ATTACK] hits the first Target, it bounces towards another target within 4.5m of the orginal target, make a second [RANGED MARTIAL ATTACK] against that target and on a hit it recieves half the damage.

weaponManeuvers.name: Impale
weaponManeuvers.description:
Make a Weapon Attack with a thrown weapon. if the [ATTACK] was successful and exceeds or matches the targets [HARDNESS] it is pushed a number of meters equal 1 + half [STR] away from you.
If any target is blocking that movement, instead of crashing into it, that movement stops and the blocking target recieves half the damge from the [RANGED MARTIAL ATTACK]

weaponManeuvers.name: Shield block
weaponManeuvers.description: If you are hit by an [ATTACK] that is higher than your shield block and not a critical hit, you can use this [REACTION] and block the [ATTACK] with your shield as if it where lower than your Shield block.

maneuverPush.pushingDescription: You can also use this ability when the [ATTACK] was a critical hit.

weaponManeuvers.name: Parry stance
weaponManeuvers.description: Each time you use the Parry or Improved Parry Ability without consuming a [REACTION]

maneuverPush.pushingDescription: Each [STAMINA] used grants you a +2 bonus to the [D20 TEST] when using the Parry or Improved Parry Ability.
